_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five kinds of people who never lie d: Those who have a disease that makes them unable to lie down
Those who have vowed to never lie down
Those who have attained a meditative state where they do not need to lie down
